product_name: Wilderness Press Afoot and Afield: Los Angeles County - 3rd Edition
long_description: The newly updated edition of Afoot and Afield: Los Angeles County explores the landscape of Southern California with 200 trails ranging from gentle family walks to strenuous treks.
short_description: The newly updated edition of Afoot and Afield: Los Angeles County explores the landscape of Southern California with 200 trails ranging from gentle family walks to strenuous treks.
